articleTitle: What is FIT?
metaTitle: What is FIT? | FAQ | Fi.Money
metaDescription: FIT is Automator that helps you build a hassle-free savings habits.  It helps you automatically put aside tiny amounts into your smart deposits every week, every month, or even every day.

articleTitle: What are FIT rules?
metaTitle: What are FIT rules? | FAQ | Fi.Money
metaDescription: FIT rules automate your saving and help you build a hassle-free savings habits. It helps you to develop saving habits.

articleTitle: Tell me more about this Insights thing
metaTitle: Tell me more about this Insights thing | FAQ | Fi.Money
metaDescription: It's a judgement-free feature that helps you understand your online expenditures. Specifically, your spends on major E-commerce businesses.

articleTitle: Do you remove refunds while calculating my spend?
metaTitle: Do you remove refunds while calculating my spend? | FAQ | Fi.Money
metaDescription: Yes! Whenever we can identify those tricky little things. And also because there's no point in feeling worse than we already do about spending.

articleTitle: Why do I need to connect my Gmail account to view insights?
